name: Go Home! (acjh13)
description:
Go Home! is a game developed for Ludum Dare 46 - Theme: "Keep It Alive".

Take the role of a guy who's had too much of people breaking the pandemic lock-down and spreading the infection. 

Get them to stay home the only way you know how.

By yelling in their faces until their comply!

*Note* 

There is no audio for this game, so you can yell in real life for a more immersive experience
